jpmorgan.description: I recently participated in JPMorgan Chase’s virtual job simulation, where I used JPMorgan’s own open source library called Perspective, to build a live graph that displays a data feed for traders to monitor.
jpmorgan.name: JP Morgan Chase Software Engineering Virtual Experience

proudpWebTrial.description: proudP is a men's prostate health care app by Soundable Health that allows you to record your urine sounds and analyzes your bladder health using AI. I developed its web trial version  that gives a glimpse of proudP technology.
proudpWebTrial.name: proudP Web Trial

automaticPathDetection.description: While interning at Soundable Health, I had the opportunity to rework the algorithm that automatically detects possible paths and their intersections of any given geo-spatial map. By using morphological operations and graph traversal methods, I was able to decrease the overall running time by an average of 90 seconds!
automaticPathDetection.name: Automatic Path Detection

pennFreeFoodExchange.description: Do you have any leftover food? Instead of throwing it away, share it on Penn Free Food Exchange! Originally an idea from my friend Ethan Markwalter, PFFE allows users to simply drop a pin on the map and share the free food details (NOTE: must have a Penn email to join).
pennFreeFoodExchange.name: Penn Free Food Exchange

stringSearchVisualizer.description: For my first project of 2024, I created a website that helps visualize various string search algorithms, from the näive, brute-force approach to Knuth-Morris-Pratt (KMP) and Rabin-Karp algorithms. Simply enter the text and the pattern to search for within the text, and then press "Visualize"!
stringSearchVisualizer.name: String Search Visualizer

jdtodo.description: JDTodo is more than a simple todo list application. Built with React.js frontend and Flask backend, It allows you to create multiple projects (i.e. CIS-1210 Exam Study Plan, Spring Break Travel), and for each project, you can create its own todo-list! You can also create your account where all your information will be saved.
jdtodo.name: JDTodo

locus.description: For our final project for CIS-3500, my team and I built a club-management system for Penn clubs (both web and mobile). With Locus, clubs around campus can manage their members, create projects, assign different tasks, and also send realtime messages.
locus.name: Locus
